entries.title: UK Twitter employees legal threat over redundancies
entries.description: A legal letter seen by BBC News calls workers' treatment "unlawful, unfair and completely unacceptable".

entries.title: UK investor reported losing £1m in FTX collapse
entries.description: Twelve others also reported losses in the failed exchange to a City of London Police scam hotline in November.

entries.title: iPhone designer Sir Jony Ive pays tribute to Tom Karen
entries.description: Sir Jony Ive said the late designer "perfectly embodied the ideals and values of a generation".
